name: Galactic Dice Roll
description:
A spin on the classic Asteroids game! Your ship components are periodically regenerated based on a dice roll! Each component has its own advantages and disadvantages, and with 27 different combinations, each round will present its own challenge! 

Controls:

  • W - thrust
  • A - rotate counter-clockwise
  • D - rotate clockwise
  • Space - Fire!

Components:

Weapons:

  • Cannon - slow rate of fire, hits hard!
  • Auto-Cannon - Rapid fire! Balanced fire rate and firepower.
  • Laser - Continuous fire, but weaker impact.

Ship Body:

  • Heavy - Great defense, but lower agility.
  • Medium - Balanced defense and agility.
  • Light - Low defense, but high agility! 

Thrusters:

  • Large - High top speed, low acceleration.
  • Mid - Balanced top speed and acceleration.
  • Small - Lower top speed, but high acceleration!
